2243 PLACEMENT Intech Organics Limited Job Description: Graduate Engineer Trainee (GET) Intech Organics LimitedLocation: Gurugram (Head Office Location), can be relocated to manufacturing sites asrequired.Department: Operations / Maintenance / Projects / ProcessPositions Available: 4 Chemical Engineers 2 Mechanical Engineers 2 Instrumentation & Electrical EngineersAbout Intech Organics LimitedIntech Organics Limited is a leading chemical manufacturing organization engaged in theproduction of bromine and bromine-based compounds, inorganic chemicals, and specialtychemicals. With a strong commitment to innovation, sustainability, and operationalexcellence, we are continuously expanding our manufacturing capabilities and globalpresence.We believe in nurturing young engineering talent and providing them with opportunities tolearn, grow, and contribute to our vision of chemical excellence.Position: Graduate Engineer Trainee (GET)Job PurposeThe Graduate Engineer Trainee program aims to develop young engineering professionalsinto future leaders in manufacturing operations, maintenance, projects, and processoptimization. Selected candidates will undergo structured training at our manufacturingfacility, gaining hands-on exposure to plant operations, safety, quality, and continuousimprovement initiatives.Key Responsibilities Assist in day-to-day plant operations, monitoring key process parameters, andensuring smooth production activities. Support preventive and predictive maintenance activities to enhance equipmentreliability and uptime. Participate in troubleshooting and root cause analysis for process and equipmentrelated issues. Work on improvement projects related to productivity, energy efficiency, and processoptimization. Ensure compliance with safety, health, and environmental regulations. Collaborate with cross-functional teams in quality assurance, production planning,and engineering. Prepare technical reports, documentation, and standard operating procedures(SOPs).Educational Qualifications B.Tech / B.E. in Chemical Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, or Instrumentation& Electrical Engineering Graduating Batch: 2026 (from IITs)Desired Skills & Attributes Strong academic background with sound technical fundamentals. Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills. Positive attitude and willingness to learn. Ability to work effectively in a plant environment and in teams. Strong commitment to safety and sustainability practices.Compensation & Benefits Compensation will be as per industry standards and commensurate withqualifications and performance. Additional benefits include accommodation assistance, canteen facilities, andmedical coverage as per company policy.Selection Process1. Pre-Placement Talk (PPT) Introduction to Intech Organics Limited and careerprospects.2. Aptitude Test3. Technical Test4. Technical Interview5. HR InterviewCareer ProgressionUpon successful completion of the training period, GETs will be confirmed as AssistantEngineers or equivalent roles, based on performance and organizational requirements. Find the below details about CV Submission deadline/CGPA Cut-Off:CV Submission Starting From (yyyy-mm-dd): 2025-12-04CV Submission Ending At (yyyy-mm-dd): 2025-12-14CGPA Cut Off: 0.0Interested students are advised to apply at the ERP portal within the given deadline.No further extensions will be provided.Chairman, CDC 14-12-2025 09:08 View —

2202 PLACEMENT FN Mathlogic Consulting Services Pvt. Ltd. Test for FN Mathlogic Consulting Services Pvt. Ltd. has been scheduled for 7:30 PM, 10th December 2025. Links will be sent.Students need to register and enroll for the test as per the procedure explained below before taking the quiz. Visit the website https://campus-hiring.fnmathlogic.com/ in incognito window.1. Click on Log-in written in top right corner.2. Click on "Create new account" button given.3. Enter the relevant details in the newly open page. In the email-id field, please make sure that you enter your institute email ID and NOT any other ID. Please keep the password with you, it will be required at the time of quiz.4. Once you enter the details and click on "Create my new account" button given at the bottom of the page, a verification mail will be sent to your registered mail id. Please click on the link given in the verification mail to activate your account.5. Once you are logged in, go to "Home". Scroll down and click on "Campus Hiring" course and self enroll.6. Use the following password to attempt the test named IIT Kharagpur Placement Quiz password 123MATHLOGIC@IITKGPDeadline to register: 7:30 PM, 10th DecemberThe test named IIT Kharagpur Placement is to be attempted at the staed time with the help of a password that will be shared tomorrow.Venue: Respective locationPOC: Deepak (9024950269)CDC, IIT Kharagpur 10-12-2025 17:14 View —

2172 PLACEMENT FN Mathlogic Consulting Services Pvt. Ltd. Test for FN Mathlogic Consulting Services Pvt. Ltd. has been scheduled for 7:30 PM, 10th December 2025. Links will be sent.Students need to register and enroll for the test as per the procedure explained below before taking the quiz. Visit the website https://campus-hiring.fnmathlogic.com/ in incognito window.1. Click on Log-in written in top right corner.2. Click on "Create new account" button given.3. Enter the relevant details in the newly open page. In the email-id field, please make sure that you enter your institute email ID and NOT any other ID. Please keep the password with you, it will be required at the time of quiz.4. Once you enter the details and click on "Create my new account" button given at the bottom of the page, a verification mail will be sent to your registered mail id. Please click on the link given in the verification mail to activate your account.5. Once you are logged in, go to "Home". Scroll down and click on "Campus Hiring" course and self enroll.Deadline to register: 7:30 PM, 10th DecemberThe test named IIT Kharagpur Placement is to be attempted at the staed time with the help of a password that will be shared tomorrow.Venue: Respective locationPOC: Deepak (9024950269)CDC, IIT Kharagpur 09-12-2025 17:46 View —

2023 PLACEMENT CDC Placement process 2025-26 Presently CDC is opening all the depts, specializations (in most cases) against any opportunity being offered by the company.As placement interviews, tests are being conducted / will be conducted simultaneously, reviewing of each job notification is not possible.Hence CDC is offering the whole bouquet of interested students before the company to choose the relevant dept/ specialization etc.as decided by them.Note that CDC has no role in the shortlisting process of any company.ChairmanCDC 06-12-2025 00:22 View —

1998 INTERNSHIP Internship Opportunities Opportunities from Tech Japan inc. are mentioned below. Interested students are advised to apply accordingly.Note: Those students who have not received internship through CDC are only supposed to apply.Prior to applying for these internship opportunities, it requires registration. Registration link: https://hub.techjapan.work/register1. TOYOTA BOSHOKU CORPORATION ( TOYOTA Group）Toyota Boshoku Corporation (TOYOTA Group) is a global company engaged in the development, manufacturing, and sales of automotive interior systems and filter products. Under the philosophy of creating new value in mobile spaces, the company provides products and services that enhance comfort, safety, and design.In its core business of seats and interior systems, the company not only supplies parts but also handles the overall design of seats and proposes spatial designs,contributing to enhancing the overall value of vehicles. Additionally, it provides unit components such as air filters and oil filters, pursuing technologies that improve environmental performance and functionality.Internship DetailsApplication deadline: December 12th (Fri.) , 2025 (tentative) Internship duration: 26th May - 25th July, 2025 (tentative)Internship: For 2027 Graduates : Safety Evaluation of Aircraft Seats Internship _TOYOTA BOSHOKU ( TOYOTA Group）Link: https://hub.techjapan.work/student/internships/rp3nCupKqZh4ATGE7UvjguLocation of Internship: Offline (Aichi)Provision for PPO(Full-time offer): Yes----------------------------------------------------------------------2. Members Co.,Ltd.Our company supports corporate digital transformation (DX) by providing digital creators and promoting the internalization of DX within client organizations. We cover a wide range of digital areas, including AI implementation, data utilization, decarbonization DX, UX design, application and product development, website management, social media operations, and internet advertising, aiming to maximize the effectiveness of DX investments.Members team are especially looking forward to students who are able to speak and are currently learning Japanese languages.Internship DetailsApplication deadline: March 1st (Sun.) , 2026 (tentative) Maybe close an opportunity earlier before the deadlineInternship duration: 26th May - 25th July, 2025 (tentative)Internship: For 2027 Graduates : Looking for Candidates with Japanese Language Experience!_ 2026 Summer Internship_Corporate System Engineer | MembersLink: https://hub.techjapan.work/student/internships/8at55dftba54Zsad3q8ae4Location of Internship: OnlineProvision for PPO(Full-time offer): Yes----------------------------------------------------------------------3. artience Co., Ltd.artience is a Japan-based global materials innovator where advanced research in polymers, functional coatings, and next-generation energy materials directly leads to real-world applications.They welcome and looking foe Mtech and PhD Chemical Engineering candidates who want to drive original research, publish impactful work,and translate science into scalable technologies shaping the future of mobility, electronics, and sustainability.artience team is looking forward to MTech and PhD. students, particularly, from the Chemical department. Internship DetailsApplication deadline: December 7th(Sun), 2025 (Final reminder)Internship duration: 26th May - 25th July, 2025 (tentative)Internship: For 2027 Graduate (Master / PhD) only :2026_Summer Internship_Product Development _Flexible Packaging Ink | artience(Toyo Ink)Link: https://hub.techjapan.work/student/internships/anQqgFbYZRnGpww6ALbnrxLocation of Internship: Offline (Japan)Provision for PPO(Full-time offer): YesInternship Details②Application deadline: December 7th(Sun), 2025 (Final reminder)Internship duration: 26th May - 25th July, 2025 (tentative)Internship: For 2027 Graduate (Master / PhD) only :2026_Summer Internship_Product Development _Flexible Packaging Ink | artience(Toyo Ink)Link: https://hub.techjapan.work/student/internships/anQqgFbYZRnGpww6ALbnrxLocation of Internship: Offline (Japan)Provision for PPO(Full-time offer): Yes----------------------------------------------------------------------4. Aisin CorporationAisin Corporation is a global automotive parts manufacturer headquartered in Aichi, Japan, best known for its powertrain technologies such as transmissions.The company is expanding into EV-related technologies as well as housing and energy fields, providing a wide range of products worldwide as a major mobility supplier.Internship DetailsApplication deadline: December 26th(Fri), 2025Internship duration: 26th May - 25th July, 2025 (tentative)Internship: For 2027 Graduates Only:2026_Summer Intern_Design of Advanced Driver Assistance Systems| AISIN CORPORATIONLink: https://hub.techjapan.work/student/internships/xnq3Kca4iVcBgeVTY5ZNo9Location of Internship: Offline (Japan)Provision for PPO(Full-time offer): Yes----------------------------------------------------------------------5. Milk. IncMilk. Inc is a deep-tech startup using the space technology "Hyperspectral". With the goal of elucidating the causes of all diseases, especially cancer, we aim to become the world's most advanced diagnostic imaging company with nothing that cannot be identified, based on spectrum analysis technology that enables us to see the wavelengths of invisible light and accumulate the identification and analysis of all images including RGB, UV and IR regions. In addition to disease, hyperspectral analysis enables more advanced image analysis in various fields such as agriculture and infrastructure. In order to make space development a reality, we have established our own 10-year plan and are developing satellites and analyzing satellite data with our subsidiary, Iris Inc. By using the data to study mineral exploration and habitation zones, we will lay the foundation for an era in which humans can freely travel into space.Internship DetailsApplication deadline: December 26th(Fri), 2025Internship duration: 26th May - 25th July, 2025 (tentative)Internship: For 2027 Graduates Only:2026_Summer Intern_AI Image Systems Engineer | Milk.Link: https://hub.techjapan.work/student/internships/qTiatKxoNcTimDoE6wCd4YLocation of Internship: OnlineProvision for PPO(Full-time offer): Yes---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Chairman CDC 05-12-2025 13:08 View —

1701 PLACEMENT General Instructions for Placement Process 2025-26 Placement registered students are advised to note:1. The placement process will be conducted at the Nalanda Classroom complex only.2. All the participating students are advised to be in formal dress and should behave well with the Recruiters, Placecom, CDC office, Security and Volunteers3. Walk-in interviews, if any, will be conducted through CDC and at the Nalanda complex only (responses will be taken through Google form). Hence the participating students are advised to be present in the Nalanda and be alert.4. CDC helpline number -03222-282231 (Only available on the days of the interview, during process hours).5. All communication will be done through ERP Notice Board and WhatsApp groups so it is your responsibility to stay active and be prompt to follow the instructions sent there. The students who joined the WhatsApp groups via contact numbers different from their ERP contact numbers must reach out to the respective POC with their name and roll number. Keep checking ERP Notice Board because in case of an urgency/urgent information, students would be expected to report to Nalanda immediately.6. In case you have any queries regarding the process you may reach out to the respective POC.7. Students are required to report to their respective venue 30 minutes before the scheduled time in formal attire.8. Students are advised not to unnecessarily roam and litter around in the premises of Nalanda during interview process.9. Students sitting for interview processes are advised to keep at least 10 printouts of their CVs handy. There is no provision for print outs in the CDC Office.10. Students sitting for an online process are advised to bring their laptop, charger, earphones and any other required device to the venue. It is the sole responsibility of the student to ensure that their system is working properly.11. Students are strictly advised not to share any details regarding the placement process in any social media platform. Any such incidence will be taken very seriously and appropriate coercive action will be taken.12. In the interview board the student should not disclose the interview details of the other companies.13. It is observed that sometimes a student get shortlisted for a role other than he/she has applied. This is decided by the company, students should appear for the interview as per the shortlist of the ERP notice board.14. Those who have taken the permission from CDC to give interview in online mode, are advised to contact the concerned POC, if shortlisted. The students are also advised to note that if the company is taking the interview in offline mode (present at the campus), then it is the decision of the company whether to take any interview in online mode or not. Decision of the company in this regard is final.Chairman, CDC 28-11-2025 11:14 View —

1552 PLACEMENT EY Global Delivery Services India LLP Job Description: EY-Parthenons GDS SCM practice works on the most complex and high-profile global transactions and supply chain transformations. We are a group of experienced strategy and transaction professionals with a background in supply chain and operations who work across a broad portfolio of clients and industry sectors. As such, we bring a wealth of deep supply chain functional knowledge to our clients in the context of complex transactions and transformations. This is an opportunity to work across the entire transaction lifecycle (pre-sign diligence, sign-toclose planning, post-close execution, etc.) of the most complex integrations (M&A) and divestitures. Moreover, youll have the opportunity to help our clients solve complex supply chain problems, developing innovative solutions that transform the supply chain, improving performance and resiliency across the plan, source, make, deliver/return functions of the supply chain. Were looking for an Associate Manager, who supports key outcomes and executes complex workstreams in supply chain engagements. This is a fantastic opportunity to be part of a fastgrowing service offering in Strategy and Transactions. Your key responsibilities Manage small to mid-sized engagements or parts/workstreams of large engagements that help our clients solve some of their most pressing supply chain issues. Support key decision makers in developing and executing their transaction strategy to secure deal value. Lead projects that span one or more supply chain functions (Plan, Source, Make, Deliver) in both deal and non-deal environments. Manage engagements, problem-solve, facilitate, ensure engagement success, and quality in delivery Build relationships with EY offices across the globe. Responsible for high degree of GDS user satisfaction with engagement processes and work products Engage on larger SaT projects and pitch for potential supply chain interventions. Ability to analyse the evolving market environment and build solutions / services to cater to the same. Develop Point of View documents and support business development initiatives Manage supply chain consultants/analysts. Help the team members develop expertise in supply chain. Mentor team members to deliver on high quality output on engagements Provide insights/observations based on industry/functional knowledge and best practices that span Plan, Source, Make, and Deliver. Leverage expertise in transactions, synergy assessments, and deal implementation on transactions related projects Find the below details about CV Submission deadline/CGPA Cut-Off:CV Submission Starting From (yyyy-mm-dd): 2025-11-22CV Submission Ending At (yyyy-mm-dd): 2025-11-23CGPA Cut Off: 6.0Interested students are advised to apply at the ERP portal within the given deadline.No further extensions will be provided.Chairman, CDC 23-11-2025 16:44 View —

All students must submit a major PAN card which has their photo. This is mandatory and the only identity proof needed during our registration process.2. PAN cards made when student was a minor will not be entertained. If provided, candidate will be rejected from the process.3. E-PAN Card is accepted. Candidates can refer to the instructions available in the help link on the registration page.4. All students must mandatorily submit their PAN number and PAN copy which has their photo. PAN card application acknowledgment as a proof of PAN card will not be considered.5. PAN card which has their photo is mandatory, and the only identity proof accepted during our offer and document verification process.CDC, IIT Kharagpur 05-11-2025 11:48 View —

1139 PLACEMENT ACCENTURE (S&C Delivery Associate) All students are requested to check and confirm that their system meets the below requirements and compatibility criteria before appearing for the Accenture (S&C Delivery Associate) Test:1. The machine should be a Laptop/Desktop, DO NOT use Mobile/Tablet.2. Processor should be intel i3 and above with minimum Processor speed for 2.2 Ghz speed or above.3. RAM should be minumum 4GB and above.4. Operating system Windows 8 / 10 /11. 5. Google Chrome Browser version 80+ is mandatory (up to 5 Latest versions considered, No beta versions)6. VPN/Proxy should be disabled7. Video & Audio Webcam is mandatory & Audio Recording should be ON.8. Cookies & Pop Ups need to be enabled.9. SEB-Secure Exam Browser is mandatory to take the Test.Please ensure that your system fulfills all the above requirements well in advance to avoid any technical issues during the test.Chairman, CDC 31-10-2025 20:46 View —

1028 PLACEMENT ACCENTURE (S&C Delivery Associate) All students who have applied for Accenture for the S&C Delivery Associate Profile are required to register on the company portal before 11:59 PM, 24th October, 2025. This step is mandatory, and candidates who fail to complete the registration will not be considered for the process.Please take note of the following important instructions during the registration process: 1. A valid Adult PAN card or e-PAN card at the time of their registration2. Minor PAN card will not be accepted3. Adult PAN card with childhood photograph will not be accepted4. Adult PAN card without candidates legal guardian or father name will not be accepted5. Please enter the name as per your PAN Card (in case there is no last name on the PAN 6. 6. Card, please enter your first name twice on the portal)7. Please enter the DOB as per your PAN Card8. Please try to upload a high-resolution image of your PAN CardRegistration Link : https://indiacampus.accenture.com/register/accenture/bsclnew/apply/?event=1103335This is a helpful resource that provides a step-by-step guide on how to instantly get e-PAN card : https://youtu.be/FR2nQoIbbywAll students are requested to complete the portal registration and ensure compliance with the above guidelines by 11:59 PM, 24th October 2025.Chairman, CDC 23-10-2025 02:20 View —
1027 PLACEMENT Accenture AEH All students who have applied for Accenture AEH for the Advanced Engineering Analyst Profile are required to register on the company portal before 11:59 PM, 26th October, 2025. This step is mandatory, and candidates who fail to complete the registration will not be considered for the process.Please take note of the following important instructions regarding PAN card submission during the registration process:1. All students must submit a major PAN card which has their photo. This is mandatory and the only identity proof needed during our registration process.2. PAN cards made when student was a minor will not be entertained. If provided, candidate will be rejected from the process.3. E-PAN Card is accepted. Candidates can refer to the instructions available in the help link on the registration page.4. All students must mandatorily submit their PAN number and PAN copy which has their photo. PAN card application acknowledgment as a proof of PAN card will not be considered.5. PAN card which has their photo is mandatory, and the only identity proof accepted during our offer and document verification process.Registration Link : https://indiacampus.accenture.com/v2/registration/accenture/AEH26Plus/apply?event=1072619&job=1202061All students are requested to complete the portal registration and ensure compliance with the above guidelines by 11:59 PM, 26th October 2025.Chairman, CDC 23-10-2025 02:01 View —

880 INTERNSHIP FirstClub Technology Job Description: About the RoleWere looking for bright, ambitious interns to join us as Generalists across Category, Growth, and Sell functions. This is a high-ownership internship where youll work on real business problems in analytics, customer growth, and partner/seller engagement.Youll be part of a fast-paced 0→1 startup journey, with the opportunity to shape how curated products are brought to market and scaled.What Youll Work OnAnalytics & Insights: Build dashboards, analyze customer data, and surface insights that drive decisions across Category and Growth.Growth Projects: Contribute to experiments on user acquisition, engagement, and retention; work on performance tracking and optimization.Category Support: Assist in identifying new products/brands, curating assortments, and conducting competitive benchmarking.Sell & Partnerships: Support in outreach, building relationships with brand partners, and preparing pitch materials.Problem-Solving: Take ownership of mini-projects that cut across functions and present your findings to leadership. Find the below details about CV Submission deadline/CGPA Cut-Off:CV Submission Starting From (yyyy-mm-dd): 2025-10-06CV Submission Ending At (yyyy-mm-dd): 2025-10-07CGPA Cut Off: 0.0Interested students are advised to apply at the ERP portal within the given deadline.No further extensions will be provided.Chairman, CDC 06-10-2025 18:05 View —

847 INTERNSHIP Nupi Infotech Job Description: About NUPI: NUPI runs Multi-Brand Loyalty programs for our Partners and simplify some of the largest global Brands to acquire and retain customers online/offline aiming to be the trusted partner for consumers in their Brand selection process. It offers a Redemption Engine to consumers leveraging the groups acquired SME-commerce capacities. NUPI provides an all-in-one solution for Loyalty, rewards and recognition to empower brands to maximize their customer acquisition efforts and turn transactional sales into passionate brand advocates. NUPI builds omni channel (website, mobile App or In-store POS machines) CRM tech-solutions for its brand partners to enable community reach. Responsibilities:   Work with the Leadership team on new intrapreneurial opportunities. Your primary goal is to help the Executive Chairman, and thus, the organization be more effective. In doing so, you will play a number of roles as an air traffic controller for the leader and the senior team; as an integrator connecting work streams that would otherwise remain siloed; as a communicator linking the leadership team and the broader organization; as an honest broker and truth teller when the leader needs a wide-ranging view; and as a confidant without an organizational agenda, as this HBR article puts it. This includes but is not limited to preparing and reviewing material for internal and external priorities, maintaining operational rhythms moving agendas forward and anticipating and working through risks, as well as drafting well-articulated communications, often under significant time pressure. This is a demanding role. Help incubate/ refine and run essential systems and processes for the company and the Chairman, such as all-hands and leadership meetings, preparation of material for board meetings and internal and external communications. Support the fostering of the organizational culture and recruitment efforts. Sense and implement opportunities for process improvements across functions.  Identify, strategize and co-develop best-in-class product solutions and business growth levers.  Shape product and business by building powerful and lasting partnerships that offer brands and merchants innovative ways to grow. Be a part of building out new products, fast experiments, industry and competitor research.  Liaison with the Product team to launch new innovative Payment methods for customers that throttle customer delight. Work Closely with the Product team, to organize and align strategic priorities on cross- functional projects like Product builds, act as a gatekeeper of tasks that can be resolved without direct involvement of Chairman.  Developing financial models along with approaches for continued improvement in efficiency and effectiveness. Creation of Executive & Investor presentations and dashboards. Creation of sophisticated data models.    Developing market knowledge and ecosystem know-how for future product requirements and business drivers. Monitoring and reporting of key success metrics. Identifying technical issues and gaps faced by existing and new customers via market studies and data analytics. Drive key relationships and Business Development with the leadership team and interface with other teams like Product, Marketing, Analytics, Finance & Ops to drive win-win-win engagements. Create a knowledge pool and participate in leadership discussion for product improvements and modifications. Solution new products in Loyalty and Payments with leadership team. Create a systematic, process-driven approach to identify and source new partnerships opportunities. What you will gain from this role:              Leadership training Experience in 360-degree visibility to organizational growth and development, early in your career. Professional effectiveness, including skills such as nimbleness, task-management and judgement. Work closely with the Founders and leadership, experiencing the pace, challenges, and excitement of building a company from the ground up. Unlike traditional roles, youll touch multiple functions (product, marketing, finance, operations, strategy) and see how all pieces come together to grow a business. Be part of discussions where key business decisions are made, gaining an insiders view into how strategies are built and executed. Develop the ability to work in ambiguity, create structured solutions, and drive outcomes with limited resources a skill highly valued in any career. You wont just execute tasks, youll own outcomes. This accelerated responsibility fast-tracks your learning curve. Work with senior stakeholders, partners, and cross-functional teams, building relationships that will be valuable throughout your career. Get the chance to ideate, test, and iterate on new products, campaigns, and growth levers in real time. Sharpen skills like communication, leadership, time management, and adaptability while building resilience in a fast-changing environment. Unlike large corporations where work can get siloed, here youll see the direct impact of your contributions on company growth. Learn directly from the Founders office a rare opportunity to understand not just the what but also the why behind strategic choices. Skills & Qualifications:      Possess the capacity to remain focused on the task at hand as well as multi-tasking. Have a strong sense of ownership for assigned tasks and a willingness to go the extra mile. Self-directed, resourceful, and comfortable with operating in ambiguity. Advanced experience with MS Word, MS Excel, MS Powerpoint, Scrum and Analytics tools. Have high energy levels, self-motivated, positive attitude. 846 INTERNSHIP Caprae Capital Job Description: Description: Caprae Capital Partners PE Internship ProgramCaprae Capital Partners is a global investment platform backed by a U.S. family office. Unlike traditional private equity funds, we are a technology-enabled business designed to modernize and disrupt the investment industry. We partner with entrepreneurs, operators, and founders while directly building long-term businesses within our ecosystem.Internship OverviewThis program is designed for exceptional students who aspire to build careers in private equity, investment banking, or management consulting. As a Buyside Research & Financial Due Diligence Intern, you will work closely with our U.S. and India teams on live transactions.Your responsibilities will include:Conducting detailed industry and company research to identify acquisition opportunities.Performing financial statement analysis, valuation, and modeling to assess potential investments.Supporting the due diligence process, including market mapping, competitor benchmarking, and risk analysis.Preparing investment memoranda, research reports, and presentation materials for senior leadership.Participating in weekly deal review discussions with global deal teams.Collaborating with advisers, brokers, and in-house platforms to advance transactions.Key HighlightsWorkload: 60+ hours per week (full immersion in live projects).Exposure: Direct experience with U.S. and international M&A transactions.Mentorship: Guidance from senior professionals in private equity and corporate development.Skill Development: Hands-on training in financial modeling, valuation, due diligence, and strategic analysis.Career Outcomes: Strong foundation for roles in private equity, consulting, and investment banking.Candidate ProfileStudents from IIT Madras, IIT Bombay, and other leading institutions pursuing degrees in Engineering, Economics, Finance, or Management.Strong analytical ability and attention to detail.Excellent written and spoken English.Capacity to commit significant time and effort in a high-performance environment.Intellectual curiosity and a desire to learn how global investments are executed.Future OpportunitiesHigh-performing interns may be invited to continue with Caprae Capital in advanced roles, including deal sourcing, investment analysis, and portfolio strategy. Alumni of our program have gone on to pursue careers in top global firms and entrepreneurial ventures.Our Hiring ProcessOur hiring process is designed to identify candidates who align with both our professional standards and long-term vision. The process begins with applicants submitting their resume and completing a virtual, pre-recorded interview. Selected candidates will then be asked to complete a written submission that outlines their career aspirations and demonstrates their understanding of our investment criteria. Submissions are carefully reviewed and scored, and candidates who achieve a high enough evaluation will be invited to participate in a live Zoom interview with one of our companys founders. This structured approach ensures we assess both technical and cultural fit at each stage of the process. We choose the model, prompt, context and memory that work best so replies are more accurate, faster, and more useful.2. Who we are.Im Ushnish, IIT Kharagpur 15. I did a PhD in AI at Cambridge, then spent time in industry and saw the gap between pretty benchmarks and what users actually need. My co-founder Federica Freddi and I left the lab to fix that. We started Sqwish in Cambridge with support from the university and strong angels. We are small, hands-on, and ship fast. You will work directly with us and see your work reach real users.3. What youll work onPick a primary lane and collaborate across the rest.Research: simple learning policies, reward design, practical evaluation.ML/MLOps: low-latency services, routing, containers, profiling, observability.Data: clean feedback pipelines, clear schemas, batch and streaming jobs.Backend: APIs for routing and memory, caching, rate limits, safe rollouts and rollbacks.Our stackPython, FastAPI, Postgres, Redis, Docker, basic K8s, Grafana and Prometheus, Weights & Biases, open models like Llama and Qwen, and TypeScript/React for internal tools. Rust or Go is a bonus, not required.4. What we valueClear code that runs fast and fails safe.Evidence over hype. Plots and tests beat opinions.Builders who remove flakiness without drama.Plain writing that others can follow.5. LogisticsWe're remote-friendly but we are building a base in Bangalore!Stipend: 2000 USD per month (Bangalore-based) gross salaryDuration: 3 months, flexible. Strong interns get return offers.We provide mentorship, GPU time, and real data with privacy guardrails.6. 836 INTERNSHIP eBay Job Description: Software Engineer InternLocation: Bengaluru, IndiaAt eBay, we're more than a global ecommerce leader were changing the way the world shops and sells. Our platform empowers millions of buyers and sellers in more than 190 markets around the world. Were committed to pushing boundaries and leaving our mark as we reinvent the future of ecommerce for enthusiasts.Our customers are our compass, authenticity thrives, bold ideas are welcome, and everyone can bring their unique selves to work every day. We're in this together, sustaining the future of our customers, our company, and our planet.Join a team of passionate thinkers, innovators, and dreamers and help us connect people and build communities to create economic opportunity for all.****If your application advances, youll be asked to complete a CodeSignal Technical Assessment. Please make sure the email on your RippleMatch profile matches the email on your existing CodeSignal account. We cannot resend or redirect the CodeSignal link to a different email. If the emails dont match, youll need to retake the assessment using the correct account.****About the role:We are looking for motivated software engineer interns to build robust and scalable software, help improve our code services and system architecture, participate in brainstorming sessions and supply ideas to our technology, algorithms and products, and work with the product and design teams to understand end-user requirements, formulate use cases, and deliver results.You bring strong technical talent and programming skills, as well as a keen desire to deeply understand our products and services to push our technology forward. Youll work alongside the best and the brightest engineering talent in the industry. As a core participant of your team, youll estimate engineering efforts, prioritize projects, plan implementations, and triage production issues. You need to be dynamic, collaborative, and curious as we build new experiences, improve existing products, and develop distributed systems powering the worlds largest e-commerce websites at a scale few companies can match.What you will bring:Currently enrolled as a student in an accredited Bachelors, Masters degree program within India graduating December 2026 - Summer 2027.Maximum of 0-3 years of Professional/Full time relevant work experience (Not including Internships).Programming expertise. Proficient with object-oriented programming concepts, design patterns, and the complete SDLC. Be comfortable with algorithms and data structures, such as dynamic array, linked list, stack, queue, binary search, binary search tree, hash map, depth first search, breadth first search, and merge sort.A go-getter. Seeks new opportunities, doesnt shy away from challenges, and brings energy and enthusiasm to the office every day.Key skills: Java, Python, Scala, JavaScript or any other Programming language. Solid understanding of OOP/OOD , distributed systems, cloud-related knowledge. Interest in Full Stack development (Front and Back).Experience applying Generative AI to areas such as code generation, debugging, test case creation, and documentation is a strong plus.Strong applied experience. Youve built, broken, and rebuilt software applications in Private Projects, Academic Projects, Prior Internships and/or Previous Work experience.Creative thinker who knows how to create real-world products.Analytical. Able to convert abstract concepts into viable products using CS fundamentals.Resourceful. Have the ability to do a lot with a little. Be able to aggregate information from various places and build relationships with key partners to get the information you need.Data Driven. Able to use data to frame out and solve problems.Why Youll Love It HereDrive real impact at the core of product discovery innovation.Work hands-on with cutting-edge AI and data platforms.Collaborate with some of the best minds in AI, Product, and Engineering.Own high-visibility projects in a startup-like, high-trust culture.Build scalable, magical, and relevant product data systems used by millions.Benefits & PerksCompetitive internship stipend.Mentorship and learning opportunities with senior leaders.Exposure to high-impact projects with global visibility.Access to eBays learning and development programs.Diversity, Inclusion & BelongingDiversity, inclusion, and belonging are at the heart of eBays culture. Were committed to creating a workplace where everyone feels valued, supported, and empowered to succeed. We encourage applicants from all backgrounds to apply.Please see the Talent Privacy Notice for information regarding how eBay handles your personal data collected when you use the eBay Careers website or apply for a job with eBay.eBay is an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status, and disability, or other legally protected status. If you have a need that requires accommodation, please contact us at talent@ebay.com. We will make every effort to respond to your request for accommodation as soon as possible. View our accessibility statement to learn more about eBay's commitment to ensuring digital accessibility for people with disabilities. The eBay Jobs website uses cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to browse the site, you agree to our use of cookies. Visit our Privacy Center for more information. 809 PLACEMENT Notice regarding PWD Students in CDC Placement Process Some concerns have been raised regarding the status of PWD students at CDC. The following points are hereby clarified:1. Eligibility of a PWD student will be considered strictly as per the ERP records. No other certification will be entertained.2. CDC provides special mobility facilities for PWD candidates during the placement process, subject to prior intimation from the concerned candidates.3. All eligible PWD students will be extended the privileges as applicable. However, the final decision of awarding additional time or any other special assistance during online assessments lies solely at the discretion of the recruiter.Chairman, CDC 23-09-2025 17:36 View —

799 INTERNSHIP Qualcomm Job Description: Job Location: HyderabadWe know our employees ideas have changed the world. For more than three decades, weve been a global leader in innovation and intellectual property in mobile technology, continually pushing the boundaries of whats possible. We have an IP portfolio covering a wide range of technologies with 160k+ patents/patent applications worldwide. Working with customers across industries from automotive to health care, from smart cities to robotics we continue to accelerate innovation and unlock new possibilities in a time where everything is connected. By joining the Qualcomm family, you too can bring the future forward faster. As an IP Attorney Intern, you will work on protecting Qualcomms intellectual property related to cutting edge technologies. We are looking for energetic, creative and self-driven individuals to help implement our IP strategy. Interns will have an opportunity to work with our Legal and Engineering teams. They will work on various aspects of IP development and analysis including but not limited to the following areas:Discussions with inventors around patentable innovations in the latest technologies like 5G, etc.Patent prosecutionInfringement analysisAnalysis of latest judgements related to IPRTracking legal developments around patent law, rules, and legal practice Eligibility and Hiring Process:Master's degreeStudents who have completed IPR courseScience background is preferred.Three rounds of interview, two by the team in India and one by the SD team. Find the below details about CV Submission deadline/CGPA Cut-Off:CV Submission Starting From (yyyy-mm-dd): 2025-09-22CV Submission Ending At (yyyy-mm-dd): 2025-09-23CGPA Cut Off: 7.0Interested students are advised to apply at the ERP portal within the given deadline.No further extensions will be provided.Chairman, CDC 22-09-2025 13:17 View —

787 INTERNSHIP IBM India Job Description: IRL INTERN Quantum ComputingSummer Internship Program is one of the major activities under the University Relation Program. IBM Research India offers Summer Internship to the bright students of leading technical Universities in India. IBM Research India provides industry experience and world class technologies to these students to show their talent. During internship students work on current projects happening in the lab, they solve problems with the help of their mentors. Idea is to give industry experience to the students and look for future employees.Summer Internship Program is one of the major activities under the University Relation Program. IBM Research India offers Summer Internship to the bright students of leading technical Universities in India. IBM Research India provides industry experience and world class technologies to these students to show their talent. During internship students work on current projects happening in the lab, they solve problems with the help of their mentors. Idea is to give industry experience to the students and look for future employees. You will play a key role in developing data pipelines, optimization models, andanalytics modules that power Pull Logics inventory and supply chain intelligence platform.Key Responsibilities Design, implement, and maintain Python packages and reusable class libraries for data processing, modeling,and optimization. Build and optimize machine learning / statistical models for demand forecasting, inventory optimization, andsupply chain analytics. Collaborate with product managers, researchers, and engineers to translate mathematical models intoproduction-grade solutions. Develop efficient data workflows for ingesting, cleaning, and transforming structured and unstructureddatasets. Contribute to architectural decisions to ensure scalability, performance, and reliability of AI-driven modules. Stay up to date with latest advancements in machine learning, optimization, and applied mathematics. The work will be conducted entirely on a remote basis The declared stipend amount is: 120000 INR Chairman, CDC 03-09-2025 18:26 View —

695 INTERNSHIP Vellex Computing Job Description: About the Role :We are developing an advanced software stack that enables the integration of mathematical modeling, circuit simulation, and embedded logic for edge computing applications in energy, control, and automation. As an intern, you will contribute to building the software tools and infrastructure that drive simulation pipelines, embedded control workflows, and hardware interfacing. The work involves circuit modeling, object-oriented programming, data-driven workflows, and software abstractions that support digital and analog system behavior. Youll help prototype and validate software systems that interact with physical electronics and real-time computing platforms.What Youll Do :● Work with electronic components such as transistors, Op-Amps, FETs, andpassive/active circuit elements● Simulate and model circuit behavior using tools like LTspice, NGSpice, or equivalent ● Develop software tools to automate circuit generation, simulation workflows, and result parsing ● Implement firmware or system code on microcontrollers (e.g., STM32, ESP32) and edge devices (e.g., Jetson, Raspberry Pi) ● Prototype embedded logic or control blocks using FPGAs or FPAAs ● Use object-oriented programming (OOP) principles to build maintainable and reusable simulation and control frameworks ● Benchmark system performance across metrics like latency, stability, powerconsumption, and accuracyRequired Skills :● Strong understanding of circuit fundamentals, including behavior of transistors (BJT,MOSFET) and operational amplifiers (op-amps) ● Experience using circuit simulation software (LTspice, NGSpice, or similar) ● Proficiency in Python (including libraries such as NumPy, SciPy, matplotlib, pandas) ● Working knowledge of C/C++ for embedded or systems programming ● Understanding of object-oriented programming (OOP) and modular software designNice to Have :● Hands-on experience with HDL (Verilog/VHDL) or FPGA-based prototyping ● Previous work in hardware-software co-simulation or hardware-in-the-loop (HIL) setups ● Interest in analog-digital hybrid systems, reconfigurable computing, or unconventional computing modelsWhat Youll Gain :● Deep understanding of physical computing and hardware-accelerated system design ● Hands-on experience with integrated analog, digital, and software-based computation ● Exposure to real-world applications in energy, optimization, and embedded intelligence ● Close mentorship and the opportunity to contribute meaningfully to a research-grade product Find the below details about CV Submission deadline/CGPA Cut-Off:CV Submission Starting From (yyyy-mm-dd): 2025-09-02CV Submission Ending At (yyyy-mm-dd): 2025-09-03CGPA Cut Off: 6.5Interested students are advised to apply at the ERP portal within the given deadline.No further extensions will be provided.Chairman, CDC 02-09-2025 15:52 View —

616 PLACEMENT CDC Placement Process To ensure accuracy and fairness in the CVs, students are requested to follow the guidelines below while submitting documents for verification. Please note that entries without valid proof may not be considered.1. Competitions (Participation/Wins): Upload the official certificate issued by the organizing body. If there is any position, then that should be clearly stated on the certificate given by the issuing authority. In the case, no certificate is issued, an official email or letter from the organisers should be produced confirming the candidates' participation.2. Entrepreneurship Experience: Founder: Proof of registration/incorporation or an official document/letter confirming the role. Non-Founder (Team Member/Intern): An official letter from the founder/organization clearly stating the role and duration.3. Self-Initiated Projects: Provide project links (e.g., GitHub, website, published work) and/or a comprehensive document describing objectives, process, and outcomes; the order is to be followed as well and proofs/code links are to be given wherever required.4. Academic/Professor-Guided Projects: Upload a completion/acknowledgement certificate signed by the guiding professor.5. Internships: For an internship stated as completed should contain both the offer letter and the completion letter of the same. For an ongoing internship, only an offer letter is to be uploaded.6. Position of responsibility: For the position under any specific hall of residence, it is to be approved by the warden; for the position under any specific society/cell/fest, it is to be approved by the professor-in-charge/organization under which it is operating.Students are encouraged to arrange and upload documents carefully in the prescribed format to ensure smooth verification of their CVs.Chairman, CDC 21-08-2025 12:14 View —

597 PLACEMENT CDC Placement process 2025-26 All the MS and PhD students (except sponsorship students) who are willing to register for placement session 2025-26 are advised to take a note of the followings.a) They should write an application (hardcopy) addressed to Chairperson CDC that he / she will submit the synopsis latest by 31st January 2026, and once the defense is done he / she will be out of the placement process. It is the responsibility of the student to inform CDC about this event.b) They should also declare that they have not registered with CDC in the session 2024-25.c) This aforesaid application should be approved by the supervisor before sending it to CDC.d) CDC after verifying the same can give access to the student for 3/ 4 days and within that time period the student has to prepare his / her CV in ERP (CDC tab).e) Hence all the students (PhD / MS) applying for placement registration at CDC, is advised to check their email IDs at regular intervals.f) Once the registration process is complete, the students can see what companies (In CDC Notice Board, ERP-CDC tab) are coming and they can apply in those companies only which are open for their department and degree.Chairman CDC 19-08-2025 17:59 View —

529 PLACEMENT CDC Placement Process_2025-26 CDC will start the ERP registration for placement 2025-26 from 12th August 2025 (after 7:00 PM onwards).Students have to complete their placement registration process (CV building) within 25th August 2025 (11:59 PM). No further extension will be provided.All the potential eligible students will be provided two consecutive registration windows i.e. one in the month of August, 2025 (for first phase till December) and another in the month of January, 2026 (for second phase till March). By registering in the month of August they can participate in Phase - I placement session i.e in December and by registering in the month of January they can participate in Phase - II placement i.e. from January to March. It is the choice of the students on which phase (Phase - I in December and Phase - II from January to March) they want to register.However, once a student is graduated from the Institute he/she will not be permitted to participate in any further placement process, even though he/ she has not availed two opportunities or availed but not placed.All the students who have accepted the PPO are strictly advised to register for CDC placement, otherwise in CDC placement data their name will be missed out.Students are advised to keep their CV content ready along with the relevant documents which are needed to be uploaded for further verification.Students are advised to note the followings:a) For hall related activities concerned Warden / Asst. Warden may be approached.b) For Gymkhana related activities including inter IIT- General Secretary/ President of Gymkhana may be approached.c) For activities of various societies- Concerned Head of the Society may be approached.d) For any activities from outside the institute, including competitions, best paper and conference etc.- mail copy of CONFIRMED PARTICIPATION and congratulatory mail for wining best papers / any prizes, E-certificate is to be uploaded.e) Project done under In house Faculty (other than academic requirement) - relevant certificate from the Faculty is to be uploaded.f) Publication: First page of publication/ acceptance of review email/ acceptance letter.g) Departmental activities/ Student council activities- Relevant proof from concerned Head/ Faculty is to be uploadedh) All PORs should be certified properly with the supporting documentsi) Any rank mentioned like code challenge rank etc.- is to supported by mail from the company domain/ certificate.j) Any scholarship - is to be supported with proper authenticate documents.k) Department rank (if mentioned)- is to be attached with supporting documents from HoD/HoS/HoCl) For M.Tech students- B.Tech projects done elsewhere - proper certificate is to be attachedm) Duly signed CDC Internship completion form (format attached) / Duly signed internship completion certificate of a company / duly signed internship completion certificate from the Research Guide of the Research , Educational Institute / Email from the HR or Team Manager (Mail must be from company domain , company email id with designation and mobile number)m) The size of the PDF must be less than 300 KB to be uploaded in ERP.Chairman CDC 12-08-2025 19:40 View View

264 INTERNSHIP Mock Interview Link To assist you in preparing for the upcoming CDC interviews, we are providing access to wiZes AI Mock Interviewer a platform that simulates real interview scenarios.You may select your target role or company, attempt the mock interview at your convenience, and receive an in-depth performance analysis. This will help you identify key improvement areas , whether in technical knowledge, communication, or confidence and be better prepared.Access link: https://wize.co.in/interviews(Please login using your KGP email ID)For specific role or company requests, write to admin@wize.co.in.Make sure to use it well. All the best!Please utilize this valuable resource to enhance your interview skills.Note: CDC has no involement in conductiing this mock interview. This is just an platfrorm which is developed by one of our alumni which may help you to prepare yourself for the upcoming career opportunities.Chairman CDC 24-07-2025 13:03 View —
263 INTERNSHIP HEST 2025 This is regarding the launch of the 5th edition of the Higher Education Scholarship Test (HEST) 2025, India's Largest Scholarship Test.Indian nationals who aspire to Study Abroad can take this test and get scholarships up to INR 2 crores ($240K).Test Details:Date & Time - Select a 40 mins test slot anytime between 24th to 28th July, 2025Mode - Online (Mobile/ Tablet/ PC)Syllabus - General Aptitude and Verbal LearningRegistration Fees - Zero Registration deadline: 27th July 2025Know more and Register for the test (Free): hest.wemakescholars.comNote: Interested students may apply. CDC has no role in the selection process.Chairman CDC 24-07-2025 12:51 View View

201 INTERNSHIP American Express 1) The test link will be mailed to the students. The test link is intended exclusively for the shortlisted candidates listed in the attachment. Please refrain from sharing it with anyone not on the list. (2) To start the test, system would require you to operate in a full screen setting. Before beginning, close all windows, tabs, email, antivirus software and any chat applications and set your system to Do Not Disturb mode. Any notification may result in a warning, leading to disqualification.(3) It is crucial for each student to review the system requirements and instructions at the beginning of the test, which will only take a few minutes.(4) The start page will require some preliminary information, such as your full name and official valid campus email address on which you will receive OTP to proceed. Candidates must use their official valid campus email address to attempt the assessment, and it can only be done on a laptop/desktop. Mobile phones are not permitted.(5) Ensure that the internet connection is stable at the test location. 2 INTERNSHIP Travelling window for potentially eligible students for Internship 2025-26 All the students who will register for CDC internship process of 2025-26 may note:Travel window for the potentially eligible students for internship will be from 11th July to 13th July, 2025.All the tests (if conducted) before the travel window time will be conducted online, that means students can write their tests / process from their respective locations.From 18th July 2025 onwards all the tests may be conducted at Nalanda and student must come to Nalanda to write the test / process, otherwise their candidature will be treated as null and void.Chairman CDC 19-06-2025 17:07 View View
1 INTERNSHIP CV Building for Internship 2025-26 Opening of CV portal for CDC Internship registration _2025-26All the potential eligible students of compulsory Internship (who will go for internship 2026 summer) are advised to kindly note the followings:CV Portal in ERP for CV building (for Internship) is being started from today (19/06/2025) and will be open till 26th June 2025, 11.59 pma) You will be provided very short duration, so be alert and follow CDC notice board in ERP to have regular updates.b) By enrolling in the CDC Internship portal, you are also confirming that, you will go for compulsory internship in the year 2026 from May to Mid-July (as per academic schedule).c) Please pass this message to your fellow mates who will go for compulsory internship in the year 2026.d) Registration for Internship is must and CDC, IIT Kharagpur is requesting all the students to participate in internship activities with positive spirit.Note: For students who have applied for B.Tech/ BS to Dual degree/ MS conversion will be given the access in due course of time to register in CDC portal.Chairman CDC 19-06-2025 17:03 View View
